name: AddBoardFrame
description:
Add a frame to a Miro board.

Use this tool to add a new frame item to a specified Miro board. It requires the 'boards:write' scope to operate and adheres to Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board where the frame will be created.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create a frame.

parameters.name: frame_format
parameters.description: Specify the format for the frame. Only 'custom' is supported.

value_schema.description: Only custom frames are supported at the moment.

parameters.name: frame_title
parameters.description: Title of the frame to appear at the top. It must be a string.

value_schema.description: Title of the frame. This title appears at the top of the frame.

parameters.name: frame_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of frame to create. Only 'freeform' is supported at the moment.

value_schema.description: Only free form frames are supported at the moment.

parameters.name: frame_fill_color
parameters.description: Specify the fill color for the frame using hex values. Supported colors include: `#f5f6f8`, `#d5f692`, `#d0e17a`, `#93d275`, `#67c6c0`, `#23bfe7`, `#a6ccf5`, `#7b92ff`, `#fff9b1`, `#f5d128`, `#ff9d48`, `#f16c7f`, `#ea94bb`, `#ffcee0`, `#b384bb`, `#000000`. The default is transparent (`#ffffffff`).

value_schema.description:
Fill color for the frame.
Hex values: `#f5f6f8` `#d5f692` `#d0e17a` `#93d275` `#67c6c0` `#23bfe7` `#a6ccf5` `#7b92ff` `#fff9b1` `#f5d128` `#ff9d48` `#f16c7f` `#ea94bb` `#ffcee0` `#b384bb` `#000000`
Default: #ffffffff (transparent).

parameters.name: x_axis_position_on_board
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for placing the frame on the board. Default is 0, where the center is at x: 0.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: position_y_coordinate
parameters.description: Y-axis coordinate for the frame's position on the board. Default is `0`. Center of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0`.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: frame_height_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the height of the frame in pixels on the Miro board.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: frame_width_in_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the width of the frame in pixels.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: reveal_frame_content
parameters.description: Set to true to reveal content inside the frame; false to hide it. Applicable for Enterprise plans only.

value_schema.description: Hide or reveal the content inside a frame (Enterprise plan only).
